name: Pawn
description: Base class for all Character entities.

functions.name: AddSkeletalMeshAttached
functions.description: Attaches a Skeletal Mesh as master pose to this entity
functions.description_long: Spawns and attaches a SkeletalMesh to this entity, the SkeletalMesh must have the same skeleton used by this Actor's mesh, and will follow all animations from it. Uses a custom ID to be used for removing/customizing it afterwards

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Used further for removing or applying material settings on it

parameters.name: skeletal_mesh_path
parameters.description: Path to SkeletalMesh asset to attach

parameters.name: use_parent_bounds
parameters.description: If true, this component uses its parents bounds when attached. This can be a significant optimization with many components attached together

functions.name: AddStaticMeshAttached
functions.description: Attaches a Static Mesh to this entity
functions.description_long: Spawns and attaches a StaticMesh to this entity in a Socket with a relative location and rotation. Uses a custom ID to be used for removing/customizing it afterwards

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique ID to assign to the StaticMesh

parameters.name: static_mesh_path
parameters.description: Path to StaticMesh asset to attach

parameters.name: socket
parameters.description: Bone socket to attach to

parameters.name: relative_location
parameters.description: Relative location

parameters.name: relative_rotation
parameters.description: Relative rotation

parameters.name: use_parent_bounds
parameters.description: If true, this component uses its parents bounds when attached. This can be a significant optimization with many components attached together

functions.name: GetAllStaticMeshAttached
functions.description: Gets all Static Meshes attached to this entity

return.description: the key as the Attached ID, and the value as the Asset Path

functions.name: GetAllSkeletalMeshAttached
functions.description: Gets all Skeletal Meshes attached to this entity

return.description: the key as the Attached ID, and the value as the Asset Path

functions.name: RemoveSkeletalMeshAttached
functions.description: Removes, if it exists, a SkeletalMesh from this entity given its custom ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the SkeletalMesh to remove

functions.name: SetStaticMeshAttachedTransform
functions.description: Sets a Static Mesh Attached location and rotation

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the StaticMesh set with AddStaticMeshAttached

parameters.name: relative_location
parameters.description: New relative location

parameters.name: relative_rotation
parameters.description: New relative rotation

functions.name: RemoveStaticMeshAttached
functions.description: Removes, if it exists, a StaticMesh from this enitity given its custom ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the StaticMesh to remove

functions.name: RemoveAllStaticMeshesAttached
functions.description: Removes all StaticMeshes attached

functions.name: RemoveAllSkeletalMeshesAttached
functions.description: Removes all SkeletalMeshes attached

functions.name: StopAnimation
functions.description: Stops an Animation Montage on this character

functions.name: GetMesh
functions.description: Gets the base Mesh Asset

functions.name: GetMovingTo
functions.description: Gets the Moving To location

return.description: the moving to location or Vector(0, 0, 0) if not moving
return.name: location

functions.name: SetAIAvoidanceSettings
functions.description: AI: Configures the RVO (Reciprocal Velocity Obstacles) Avoidance system used by the AIs when moving

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Whether to enable the RVO Avoidance

parameters.name: avoidance_consideration_Radius
parameters.description: The radius of the circle used to determine the avoidance distance

functions.description: AI: Makes this Character to walk to the Location
functions.description_long:
AI: Makes this Character to walk to the Location

functions.description: AI: Makes this Character to follow another actor
functions.description_long:
AI: Makes this Character to follow another actor

Triggers event MoveComplete

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: Actor to follow

parameters.name: acceptance_radius

parameters.description: Whether to stop when reaching the target

parameters.name: stop_on_fail
parameters.description: Whether to stop when failed to reach the target

parameters.description: How often to recalculate the AI path
